description: Try our easy to follow Apple & Rhubarb Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple & Rhubarb Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch rhubarb, trimed, cut into 2 cm pieces (to serve)
2 granny smith apples, peeled, cored, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Process flours in a food processor for 30 seconds until combined. Add butter and process until mix forms into fine breadcrumbs. Add 1 egg and process until mixture comes together. Turn onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth. Press dough together to form a 3cm-thick round disc. Cover in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 200Â°C. Spread rhubarb onto a baking tray lined with baking paper. Sprinkle with sugar. Bake for 10 minutes or until tender. Cool.

Place a large baking tray into the oven. Roll out dough between 2 sheets of baking paper until 3mm thick and about 35cm round. Leave pastry on baking paper. Sprinkle over almond meal leaving a 5cm border. Combine apple and rhubarb in a bowl. Pile onto almond meal. Fold pastry over filling towards centre. Whisk remaining egg and brush over pastry. Sprinkle with sugar. Transfer pie to baking tray.
Bake for 30 minutes or until pastry is golden and cooked through. Cut into wedges and serve with ice cream.
